name: Drake Pittsburgh
description: I am sweet, thoughtful, kind, and have a great sense of humor. I am very easy going and laid back. I am often told that I am very easy to talk with. I am not an angry person, and I am not interested in someone that is. Having past events shape your life is one thing, carrying the past as a burden that sits heavily upon your shoulders is not the way I view life. I am happy with myself, and my life, and I like to think it shows. I have a wonderful Son. I would do best with someone that is not extremely uptight, unless of course you are willing to learn to let things go! I love to try new things, and can laugh at myself when I fail miserably. I don’t give up easily, and have so many things I’ve yet to try. Please love to laugh and have fun, what is better than laughing so hard your stomach hurts? I love traveling, going on unknown adventures, and trying something I thought I never would. I will try anything once, well, but fun none the less! I take pride in my appearance, but am not high maintenance
